name: Hugh Jackman
summary: Hugh Jackman. Actor: Les Misérables. Hugh Michael Jackman is an Australian actor, singer, multi-instrumentalist, dancer and producer. Jackman has won international recognition for his roles in major films, notably as superhero, period, and romance characters. He is best known for his long-running role as Wolverine in the X-Men film series, as well as for his lead roles in the romantic-comedy fantasy Kate & Leopold (2001), the action-horror film Van Helsing...
awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar | 34 wins & 107 nominations total
